property.name: description
property.value: This accessor discovers devices on the local area network. It requires the discovery module. Please see: https://www.icyphy.org/accessors/wiki/Version0/Discovery

property.name: hostIP (port)
property.value: The IP address of the host. Used to discover other devices on the local area network.

property.name: devices (port)
property.value: An object containing IP addresses and (when available) names and MAC addresses of devices on the local area network.

property.name: useNmap (parameter)
property.value: True if nmap should be used for discovery, false to use ping and arp. Default is false.
